meanings.sent1: The cowy pattern on the blanket looked like spots on a cow.
meanings.sent2: The toy cow had a cowy appearance with its black and white colors.
meanings.sent3: The cowy costume made everyone laugh at the farm-themed party.
meanings.sent4: Her cowy behavior in the field made her friends nickname her 'Moo'.
meanings.sent5: The cowy design on the mug made it a favorite among dairy farmers.

meanings.sent1: The cowy milk tasted fresh and creamy.
meanings.sent2: The cowy smell of the barn reminded him of his childhood visits to the farm.
meanings.sent3: She had a cowy stubbornness when it came to trying new foods.
meanings.sent4: His cowy curiosity led him to explore the fields beyond the fence.
meanings.sent5: The cowy expression on her face showed her contentment in the pasture.

meanings.sent1: The cowy child pretended to graze on the grass during playtime.
meanings.sent2: The cowy behavior of the calf made the farmer smile.
meanings.sent3: He teased his friend for being cowy and slow to respond.
meanings.sent4: The cowy antics of the dog trying to herd the chickens amused the family.
meanings.sent5: Her cowy stubbornness in following traditions made her stand out in the group.
